scripts.clean: rimraf output dce-output .spago dist *.lock .cache src/Api assets/styles.css src/Tailwind.purs
scripts.graphql:generate: rimraf src/Api && purescript-graphql-client-generator --input-url https://countries.trevorblades.com --output src/Api --api Api
scripts.build:zephyr: if ! command -v zephyr &> /dev/null; then echo "zephyr not found, skipping dead code elimination"; else echo "Eliminating dead code..."; zephyr -f Main.main; fi
scripts.build: npm run tailwind:generate && npm run graphql:generate && npm run build:purescript && npm run build:zephyr && npm run build:parcel
